description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0473 ( Formulary Status)
name: v2 Formulary Status

text.div:
Formulary Status

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
g This observation/service is on the formulary, and has guidelinesadded v2.4
n This observation/service is not on the formularyadded v2.4
r This observation/service is on the formulary, but is restrictedadded v2.4
y This observation/service is on the formularyadded v2.4
